name: gwg-esnext-data
description: Demonstrate how to use the Data Module in a Gutenberg block in ESNext.

scripts.i18n: npm run i18n-pot && npm run i18n-json && npm run i18n-mo
scripts.i18n-pot: wp i18n make-pot ./ ./languages/gwg.pot --headers='{"Last-Translator":"JR Tashjian <jr@getwithgutenberg.com>","Language-Team":"Get With Gutenberg <info@getwithgutenberg.com>"}' && cp ./languages/gwg.pot ./languages/gwg-en_US.po
scripts.i18n-mo: for file in `find . -name "*.po"` ; do msgfmt -o ${file/.po/.mo} $file ; done
